targets.rawSql:
select time as "time",
((jsonb_path_query_first(
	settings::jsonb->'strategies', '$.market_making_strategies[*] ? (@.side == "ASK")'))
	->'calculator_settings'->0->'params'->>'delta_inv_param_min')::DECIMAL
	as ask_strategy_delta_inv_param_min,
((jsonb_path_query_first(
	settings::jsonb->'strategies', '$.market_making_strategies[*] ? (@.side == "ASK")'))
	->'calculator_settings'->0->'params'->>'delta_inv_param_max')::DECIMAL
	as ask_strategy_delta_inv_param_max,
((jsonb_path_query_first(
	settings::jsonb->'strategies', '$.market_making_strategies[*] ? (@.side == "BID")'))
	->'calculator_settings'->0->'params'->>'delta_inv_param_min')::DECIMAL
	as bid_strategy_delta_inv_param_min,
((jsonb_path_query_first(
	settings::jsonb->'strategies', '$.market_making_strategies[*] ? (@.side == "BID")'))
	->'calculator_settings'->0->'params'->>'delta_inv_param_max')::DECIMAL
	as bid_strategy_delta_inv_param_max
from settings
WHERE  $__timeFilter(time)

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  (message::json->>'price')::DECIMAL as "ask"
FROM websocket_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and message::json->>'side' = 'ask'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  (message::json->>'price')::DECIMAL as "bid"
FROM websocket_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and message::json->>'side' = 'bid'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time as "time",
  ((state->'exchange_states'->'bitclude'->'exchange_balance'->'total'->>'PLN')::DECIMAL) as "bitclude PLNs"
FROM snapshot
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time as "time",
  ((state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'account_summary'->>'equity')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "Deribit net worth"
FROM snapshot
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time as "time",
  ((state->'exchange_states'->'bitclude'->'exchange_balance'->'total'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "bitclude ETH in PLNs"
FROM snapshot
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL) as "ETH/USD"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "USD/PLN"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  (state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL as "ETH/USD"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'bitclude'->'exchange_balance'->'total'->>'PLN')::DECIMAL) as "PLNs"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'account_summary'->>'equity')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "Deribit net worth"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
    AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'bitclude'->'exchange_balance'->'total'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "ETH in PLNs"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'bitclude'->'exchange_balance'->'total'->>'PLN')::DECIMAL) as "PLNs"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'account_summary'->>'equity')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "Deribit net worth"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
    AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'bitclude'->'exchange_balance'->'total'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "ETH in PLNs"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL
  * (state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "deribit"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  min_ask_price as "min ask bitclude"
FROM bitclude_ticker_ask
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  max_bid_price as "max bid bitclude"
FROM bitclude_ticker_bid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'bitclude'->'exchange_balance'->'total'->>'PLN')::DECIMAL) as "PLNs"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'bitclude'->'exchange_balance'->'total'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL *
  (state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "ETH in PLNs"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time as "time",
  ((state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL
  * (state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "deribit"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time as "time",
  (min_ask_price) as "min ask bitclude"
FROM bitclude_ticker_ask
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time as "time",
  (max_bid_price) as "max bid bitclude"
FROM bitclude_ticker_bid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_bucket_gapfill('1 second', papiez, now() - INTERVAL '1 week', now()) as "time",
  interpolate(AVG(deribit_mark_price))
FROM deribit_mark_price
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 second', time_close) as "time",
  price  as "he bought (bid was filled) [1s bucket]"
FROM my_trades
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_close)
  and type = 'bid'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 second', time_close) as "time",
  price  as "he sold (ask was filled) [1s bucket]"
FROM my_trades
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_close)
  and type = 'ask'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  price,
  side
FROM order_maker
WHERE
  side = 'ASK' AND
  instrument = 'ETH_PLN' AND
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  price,
  side
FROM order_maker
WHERE
  side = 'BID' AND
  instrument = 'ETH_PLN' AND
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  min_ask_price "bitclude min ask"
FROM bitclude_ticker_ask
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  max_bid_price as "bitclude max bid"
FROM bitclude_ticker_bid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_close AS "time",
  price as "he sold (ask was filled)"
FROM my_trades
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_close)
  and type = 'ask'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_close AS "time",
  price as "he bought (bid was filled)"
FROM my_trades
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_close)
  and type = 'bid'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'mark_price'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL
  * (state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "deribit"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'bitclude'->'exchange_balance'->'total'->>'ETH')::DECIMAL) as "Bitclude ETH"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
    AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'account_summary'->>'margin_balance')::DECIMAL +
    (state->'exchange_states'->'deribit'->'account_summary'->>'delta_total')::DECIMAL) as "Deribit delta"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  AVG((state->'exchange_states'->'yahoo_finance'->'mark_price'->>'USD/PLN')::DECIMAL) as "USD/PLN"
FROM snapshot
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY 1
